message: The DOC_METHOD field for indicator 3-3-2, translated into all languages

data.en: Available at Definitions and reporting framework for tuberculosis – 2013 revision (WHO/HTM/TB/2013.2). Geneva: World Health Organization; 2013 (https://www.who.int/publications/i/item/9789241505345, accessed 4 January 2021).
data.fr: Disponible dans le document Définitions et cadre de notification pour la tuberculose – Révision 2013 (WHO/HTM/TB/2013.2). Genève : Organisation mondiale de la santé; 2013 (https://www.who.int/fr/publications/i/item/9789241505345, consulté le 4 janvier 2021).
